mapper.insert: insert into ai_chat_session_info (id, chat_session_code, user_intent, chat_session_memory, current_message_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{chatSessionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIntent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chatSessionMemory,typeHandler=com.galhelper.dialogue.common.handler.JsonbTypeHandler}, #{currentMessageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, chat_session_code, user_intent, chat_session_memory, current_message_id, create_time, update_time from ai_chat_session_info
mapper.update:
